articles.author: Piotr Lipinski, Helen Reid
articles.title: Carrefour pulls PepsiCo products over price hikes - Reuters
articles.description: Carrefour (CARR.PA) is telling customers in four European countries it will no longer sell products, such as Pepsi, Lay's crisps and 7up because they have become too costly, in th…
articles.content: PARIS, Jan 4 (Reuters) - Carrefour (CARR.PA) is telling customers in four European countries it will no longer sell products, such as Pepsi, Lay's crisps and 7up because they have become too costly, … [+3877 chars]
